Context:
The Career Services team at George Brown College helps students and graduates achieve their career goals. They offer their services at three locations: St. James (200 King St. East, Building A, Room B155), Casa Loma (160 Kendal Ave., Building C, Room C317), and Waterfront Campus (51 Dockside Dr., Room 104). Their contact information is as follows:

St. James: careerservices@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000 ext. 5300
Casa Loma: careerservices@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000 ext. 5301

Their services are available for students and graduates. For up-to-date hours, please visit their website at georgebrown.ca/current-students/services/career-services. Some of the services offered include learning more about the Career Centre, receiving updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more. To sign up, visit the "Sign Up Now" link provided on the website.

Their contact email for general inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca, and their phone number is 416-415-2000 with a TTY number of 1-877-515-5559. They also have a Social Media Hub for visitors to explore.

Note: The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice, and it should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
